content.rendered:
Knee Pain

Knee Pain Chiropractic Care in Sunnyvale, CA

It’s estimated that around one in four Americans suffers chronic knee pain. Knee pain can affect anyone at any age, likely in athletes, older adults, and people who don’t walk. Visiting a chiropractor can provide the best care for you or your family member suffering from knee pain. At Tropea Chiropractic Inc, our chiropractor is here to help Sunnyvale, CA, residents live free of knee pain and find the best hundred percent natural and effective treatments. We want all of our clients to feel relief from knee pain and know that they are getting the best treatment possible. We create a tailored chiropractic care plan to meet your needs!

What Causes Knee Pain?

Knee pain has multiple causes: wear and tear issues, prior injuries, arthritis, or even joint pain. When someone suffers from knee pain, some of the most common causes include:

  • Previous injuries
  • Twisting the knee wrong
  • Joint pain due to arthritis
  • Wearing down the cartilage from overuse

All these reasons can lead to severe knee pain, which can cause you to seek help from a chiropractor for acute or chronic pain.

How Does Our Chiropractor Help?

Our chiropractor will help determine the cause of your knee pain, whether you struggle with a past injury or joint trouble. They recommend manual adjustments of extremities, including your knees. Other treatments can involve massaging the knee to strengthen muscles, reduce inflammation, and stabilize the knee joint. They will then give you follow-up care, so you can rest assured your pain doesn’t return.

Find the Best Knee Pain Treatment at Tropea Chiropractic Inc.

Knee pain can be excruciating, making it challenging to complete simple tasks like walking, running, or climbing stairs. We at Tropea Chiropractic Inc. can help provide you with the best chiropractic care available for knee pain! Call us today at (408) 329-9604 to schedule an appointment and find relief.
